SELECT T1.OG_ID , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.OG_NM , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.PRTNR_KNM , (CASE WHEN T1.ROL_DV_CD = '37' THEN '엔지니어' WHEN T1.ROL_DV_CD = '55' THEN '센터소장' WHEN T1.ROL_DV_CD = '56' THEN '자재실장' ELSE '' END ) AS ROL_DV_CD , T1.CNTR_DT , T2.CARNO , (SELECT A.CARNM FROM TB_IFIN_SAP_EGBVC_DSB_RCV_ETXT A WHERE A.CARSEQ = T2.VHC_MNGT_NO AND TRIM(A.CARNO) = TRIM(T2.CARNO) ) AS CARNM , T2.VHC_MNGT_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'VHC_MNGT_TP_CD', T2.VHC_MNGT_TP_CD, 'ko') AS VHC_MNGT_TP_NM , T2.VHC_PYMDT , T2.DSB_ENDDT , T2.INSR_AGE_CD , T2.RFLNG_CDNO_ENCR , T2.HIPS_CDNO_ENCR , T2.VHC_MNGT_NO , T2.VHC_MNGT_SN , T2.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , T2.VHC_DSB_RMK_CN FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T2 ON T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.VHC_MNGT_OG_TP_CD AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W06'
AND T1.OG_ID = #{ogId}
AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo}
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T2.VHC_PYMDT AND T2.DSB_ENDDT
AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') < T2.VHC_PYMDT OR TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > T2.DSB_ENDDT)
AND T2.VHC_MNGT_NO IS NULL
AND (CASE WHEN #{session.dataFullAuthYn} = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(#{session.baseRleCd}, 1, 2) NOT IN ('W4', 'W6') THEN 1 ELSE (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OBJ_ORG TX WHERE TX.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND TX.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END) = 1 ORDER BY T1.OG_CD, T1.PRTNR_KNM, T2.VHC_MNGT_NO

SELECT T1.VHC_MNGT_NO , T1.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , T1.VHC_MNGT_SN , T1.CARNO , T1.VHC_MNGT_OG_TP_CD , T1.VHC_PYMDT , T1.DSB_ENDDT , T1.VHC_MNGT_TP_CD , T1.INSR_AGE_CD , T1.RFLNG_CDNO_ENCR , T1.HIPS_CDNO_ENCR , T1.VHC_DSB_RMK_CN , (SELECT A.CARNM FROM TB_IFIN_SAP_EGBVC_DSB_RCV_ETXT A WHERE A.CARSEQ = T1.VHC_MNGT_NO AND TRIM(A.CARNO) = TRIM(T1.CARNO) ) AS CARNM FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T1 WHERE T1.VHC_MNGT_NO = #{vhcMngtNo} AND T1.VHC_MNGT_SN = (CASE WHEN T1.VHC_MNGT_SN = 00 THEN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(MAX(T2.VHC_MNGT_SN)) FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T2 WHERE T2.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{vhcMngtNo}) ELSE TO_NUMBER(#{vhcMngtSn}) END) AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.CARSEQ , T1.OWSTAT , T1.CARNO , T1.CARNM , T1.CARDNO1 , T1.CARDNO2 FROM TB_IFIN_SAP_EGBVC_DSB_RCV_ETXT T1 WHERE 1=1 AND (TRIM(DDATE) IS NULL OR TRIM(DDATE) = '00000000') ORDER BY TRIM(CARNO)

SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T1 WHERE T1.VHC_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{vhcMngtPrtnrNo} AND (#{vhcPymdt} BETWEEN T1.VHC_PYMDT AND T1.DSB_ENDDT OR #{dsbEnddt} BETWEEN T1.VHC_PYMDT AND T1.DSB_ENDDT) AND ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM TB_SVPD_VHC_DSB_IZ T2 WHERE T2.VHC_MNGT_NO = #{vhcMngtNo} AND (#{vhcPymdt} BETWEEN T2.VHC_PYMDT AND T2.DSB_ENDDT OR #{dsbEnddt} BETWEEN T2.VHC_PYMDT AND T2.DSB_ENDDT) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
